website_summaries.verdict: You'll appreciate the low price for this beginner-level set that also ships with field marking cones.
pros: Ships with flags and belts for 10 players (two teams of five)
Bright orange cones to mark field or goal lines
Belts are long enough to fit both kids and adults
D-ring closure keep belts in place
Ships with a carrying bag to keep all pieces together
cons: Set only ships with two flags per belt, rather than three that is more common

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We use these for football with adults and they work great! It’s the only brand we by. They rip off nicely but still hard enough to make it a challenge to “tackle” the other person. We find putting a thin towel over them and then ironing them will get them nice and flat everytime for the next game.
customer_reviews.author: ChiGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great capture the flag kit.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit as a birthday present for my seven year old son. He absolutely loved the game and within 10 minutes of arriving at a local park, he had assembled a little posse of kids and they were involved in an epic game of capture the flag. The belts were easy for the kids to attach themselves and the flags have the right amount of give, strong enough that they don't fall off too easily and not flimsy. The cones are pretty useless, they are very small and if the grass is in any way long, they are obscured. This however is not a reason not to buy, just substitute them for taller cones.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great for teens
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second time I've ordered this flag football kit, each time for a different group of teens. The set is large for the price you pay. The quality of the belts and flags work well with our teenagers. Although the cones have little to no use because of their size. I find the Velcro flag to be much better than a lot of the "detachable belt" capture the flag. If your looking to make this a monthly activity, or just a quick pickup game you can't beat the price for this quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun!
customer_reviews.text: This has made for hours of fun for the entire family! Now all the kids can play and have a relatively even playing ground. You don’t have a 6 year old trying to tackle a 13 year old. Although the 13 year old gets a little upset when “tackled” by the 6 year old hahahaha
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGrows

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flags, small cones. :)
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, especially for the money! Used this for a trip to the infamous "in-laws" for thanksgiving. Kids (15, 13, 10 & 6) and I all played in the back yard and it was fantastic, almost as good as my wife's sweet potatoe pie. The Velcro for each flag is very sturdy along with the stitching that holds it together. The flag material is very strong. Belts have simple loop system that holds up well. All the kids loved it, most even said they wish their community flag football sets were as nice. The only thing that could've been nicer is bigger cones, but that was a very minor item.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: so good. The quantity and quality is perfect for what ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a couple months. So far, so good. The quantity and quality is perfect for what I'm using them for. Family gatherings, cousins & friends playing football and just plain tag. Works great with little kids and adults!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: More yellow than blue flags
customer_reviews.text: 1 star because I received the wrong amount of yellow and blue flags
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bomabrd

customer_reviews.title: Great set for kiddos and parents :)
customer_reviews.text: Great little set. Belts run long (which is great for adults who may be playing with their kids) so we cut a few of them down to size for our kiddos and singed the edges. Flags and belt are of good quality. Flags adhere to belt with velcro. Adhere well and are also easy to remove during play. Highly recommend! Wish they were cheaper than the $20 we paid for it, but there's not much selection when it comes to these kinds of items for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Afemat

customer_reviews.title: Not so much a flag, more of a tarp.
customer_reviews.text: They are made out of a tarp like material. Strong Velcro. My boys & husband have fun with these. The belts are very large so my husband ticks them around the boys for play.
customer_reviews.author: debi

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old for he and the neighbors to use versus playing "touch football" which always turns into tackle football. My entire family from my 2 year old to my husband all could wear these belts and they seem well made and are so far standing up to our rough use. I highly recommend this as a gift to football lovers or families that play sports together!
customer_reviews.author: E. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We used them for kids, so the belt is big for adults, but they tucked them in and we had no problems. Great flags.
customer_reviews.author: BRYAN S.

customer_reviews.title: Loved the product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product. Bought it for my son's bday party and all the kids loved them. They are easy to put on and fit kids ages 4 up to 12. They all have held up very well. Only issue is the cones are really small. Had to get other cones to fill in for them.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive FF set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. The Flags hold up well and the belts are plenty long enough for most size kids and adults. The cones are tiny but even in high winds they seem to stay in place fairly well. The bag the set comes in works well to keep everything together.
customer_reviews.author: K. Souligne

customer_reviews.title: Meant for Youth
customer_reviews.text: As most of the reviews state, this did come nicely packaged & feels fairly durable. However, everything is SO small. The "cones" are much to small to be of use, but I bought this set for the belts anyways. As for these belts, they need to be bigger. I have several players who are fairly large (line offensive linemen large) and they will NEVER fit into these belts. I've considered attaching 2 of them together, but that now limits how many players I can have going at a time. For the price, I guess I shouldn't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Siege

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a birthday gift to a 6 year old, it was the first gift he wanted to open and all the kids played for hours! Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Better for kids than adults - Needs a third flag
customer_reviews.text: This flag set is pretty good value for money, however it is better suited for kids than adults. The flags are too short and made of too light a material for serious adult play (makes them very hard to grab because they are so short and light). It would also be better if there was a third flag per belt. However, the heavier duty flag sets with these features are much more money. The durability is good, as we haven't had one fail on us yet. The orange cones are good for line of scrimmage markers only, too small for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Helpme

customer_reviews.title: The hit of Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son and it ended up being the hit of Christmas with a huge family football game ensuing! Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Foofie

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for any football lover
customer_reviews.text: My son has been begging for a flag football set so we got this one for him. It has super durable flags and belts which stay on very well. They could easily fit an adult as well as kids. The cones are small but are visible on green grass nicely. We used them for his birthday party with ten boys and they had a BLAST!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pavao

customer_reviews.title: Better option than clipped ones.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good flags. Used them a few times with my youth group and they have stood up to the challenge. The other ones I had were clips not velcro and they broke very quickly. Make sure that you keep an eye on where these flags fall because they can disappear on you pretty quickly if you're not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua N.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good Quality...
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the quality of this item because the cost is so low... After using them on the field I am no longer concerned. I'm pretty sure that for me though the cones are pretty much a throw away. Too small to be of much use. These are Velcro flags and have two flags per belt. I wear size 38 and they fit around me (with not much room left, but they don't fall off). But we had a bigger guy playing... maybe 40-42 or close to that, and it BARELY fit him and kept falling off during the game.
customer_reviews.author: josueMacK

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised at the quality!
customer_reviews.text: This set has held up really well against some very rough (and some very large) boys that use these belts a lot. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sallee riegler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! And it comes in a nice bag so you don't loose all the small pieces. My little sister loved it
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Spin

customer_reviews.title: Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: I watch kids and they’re gonna flip over this. They never used blue football flags before so this is like something new for them. I can’t wait to see their reaction when they see this.
customer_reviews.author: Kazeh

customer_reviews.title: pleased our athletic granddaughter to no end!
customer_reviews.text: SKLZ 10-Man Flag Football Deluxe Set W/ Flags...by Pro Performance pleased our athletic granddaughter to no end.
customer_reviews.author: pjburnTop Contributor: Historical Fiction Books

customer_reviews.title: Fun.  Decent value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a lot of fun. Nothing fancy. The velcro attachment seems to work okay - after one game. I wish that there were more color options. The cones are very small, and easily missed, but a little more precise than using someone's sweatshirt or hat or something.
customer_reviews.author: B. McAllister

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Thought my boys would love these - but once taken out of the bag, you have to smush them all back in.... so I bought another bag to keep them in.
customer_reviews.author: smithathens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our teen Boy Scouts throwing the football around ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our teen Boy Scouts throwing the football around for a bit on nearly every camp-out! If these can hold up to our rough and tumble Scouts, they will work for you!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain about them not being better because I didn't pay better money for them
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I got what I paid for. I've played about 5 games with them and they hold up. Can't complain about them not being better because I didn't pay better money for them. I host games every 2-3 weeks for casual and intense players and they work well
customer_reviews.author: Mario Boykin

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad value
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set because our 5 year old son wanted to have a 'football party' with his friends. The belts will fit all ages, and appear as though they will last. The 'cones' that came with the set are so small that they really don't serve much of a purpose...in fact in a gentle breeze they will likely flip over. You are better off buying cones separately from a sporting goods store. Overall not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Lord_Sag

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Christmas gift for my nephew. He’s 5 and he LOVES them, we played as soon as he opened his gift! The long waist strap allows children and adults to wear them. I especially like this one because they have velcro flags, I bought some from target and they were not velcro but sewn on to the band so when you pulled the flag the whole waistband would rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, nice flags
customer_reviews.text: Flags come with a belt. very sturdy but flags easily removed (good thing. Comes with 4 tiny plastic cones which arent worth using but i didnt buy this for the cones. You got 10 yellow and 10 blue flags with 10 belts. each belt gets two flags. I havent tested repeated use. but even if they get damaged after what 10 event uses? they still served there purpose for my group. In my Opinion it is a great product and very much worth the cost. Good quality and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Greynolds

customer_reviews.title: Everything you needed to get started.
customer_reviews.text: This set includes everything need to get the kids together for some flag foitball.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product... the belts are high quality. They can fit children AND adults, which was great. Cones are very small, but serve their purpose and are easy to tote along.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my guys camping trips, kids and adults love them. Just like playing football in middle school again.
customer_reviews.author: JimH

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: READY SET HIKE. BUY THIS PRODUCT PEOPLE OF ALL AGES WILL ENJOY
customer_reviews.author: Smile

customer_reviews.title: Super flag football set.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great inexpensive gift for my boys at Christmas. Super fun and easy for them to use e.g adjust the strapes. Great gift for a group of kids to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. Last abut a year or so at high level of play. But solid buy
customer_reviews.author: ZB

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheap but does the job for family holidays used 3 times already and has not broken yet
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Hard for the kids to put on, not a buckle
customer_reviews.text: The way to tie the flags is too complicated for the kids to do on their own. It’s not a buckle. I wish I would have noticed prior to purchasing and opening. Otherwise, they work great.
customer_reviews.author: arelys carballo

customer_reviews.title: Great set for flag football
customer_reviews.text: Great set for flag football. I got this for my little kids to play with and they love it. The cones are small but go their job setting up goals. This would be great for any back yard game. Was really impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Quality set
customer_reviews.text: We have used this product with both small and large groups and have played hard with this set. While the cones are a bit small, the entire set is great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Belts could be a bit longer, and would be helpful if they included an additional flag.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my flag football team to practice "tackling". The belts are quality construction and have fared well after using them a few times a week for a few months. I would have rated this better if the belts were a bit longer (some of our bigger players felt they were a bit tight) and if there was a 3rd flag on each belt.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kids to keep busy playing football. Has held up very well. Plenty of belts and flags so no one is left out. Just like real flag football. It fits adults too if they want to play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We used this at a birthday party with a bunch of girls! They absolutely loved it! I suggest this if you have active kids and to get them to put their phones away!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Niles

customer_reviews.title: Flag Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my students. They are sturdy and well made, however, I help to help most of them put them on. This is a pain. I should have checked the age before I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Ygzee

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Capture the Flag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set after my kids played Capture the Flag at a birthday party. The belts are easy to put on and the Velcro attachments can move along the belt to be better positioned for all size kids. The belt straps are a little long (assuming this is to accommodate adults), so we have to do some extra looping so my 4 year old doesn't trip on it. The cones that come in the package are small - I recommend purchasing additional cones. Overall, a good product that provides lots of backyard fun!
customer_reviews.author: SRivello

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our flag football league. The kids love it. Can’t think of anything I dislike. Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea RN

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this for playing flag football with her friends. So far so good. She likes it so that is all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: New Day Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Durable product. I am a PE teacher and we ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable product. I am a PE teacher and we have used these this past year. Not one of them are broken which says a lot with our students. 😊
customer_reviews.author: ginaA

customer_reviews.title: My 15 year old brother loved this!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old brother loved this!! He is always out playing football with his friends and this was a perfect gift for him! He's already used it a bunch and I just gave it to him a few weeks ago!
customer_reviews.author: Devon Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy! We have had adults and a bunch of boys playing with these. They had a blast and the belts have held up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Cash and Kristin Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great for Flag Football, but also great for other tag type games made up by your kids!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this flag football set ! Hosted a birthday party that included a dozen boys. Belts fit great. Our boys ended up creating other tag type games with the pieces included in this set!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Mileski

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok
customer_reviews.text: The thread on the belts start to come apart after wearing only a few times. Not the most sturdy. If I were the manufacturer, I would consider making the belt out of more durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah McLain

customer_reviews.title: They weren't the sturdiest things I bought but I got ...
customer_reviews.text: They weren't the sturdiest things I bought but I got them for my son's birthday party which we did a flag football game and most flags made it through the afternoon. I let each kid take them home as their party favors so it worked out well
customer_reviews.author: Tandemom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!!
customer_reviews.text: Hours upon hours of flag football going on! Great set!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Ashton

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set! I bought two of these for my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set! I bought two of these for my husband's surprise birthday where I gathered a bunch of his friends for a flag football game. These held up great to some big, strong guys and they had so much fun playing! Quality materials and seem like they'll last!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Danelle

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for kids to use during VBS. They loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love the flag football item.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his birthday. He loves it. He takes it to school everyday and plays with it. They are rough boys and I’m surprised it has lasted this long.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble and so far standing up to the ...
customer_reviews.text: as expected, easy to assemble and so far standing up to the rugged play
customer_reviews.author: star a. rueckert

customer_reviews.title: Using for 6 years!
customer_reviews.text: I forgot to write a review for these. Overall, great product and a lot of fun. The durability is outstanding; I've been using the same set for over six years now.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my kiddos 7th birthday party and it was a HUGE hit!!!! They had so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: So fun! 8 year old loves it. Only played with 2times so far but nothing has come apart.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I got these so we could play a modified version of capture the flag. The material is sturdy and took a beating. I would have given them 5 stars had the belt been longer for my more robust friends.
customer_reviews.author: fightergirlnpink

customer_reviews.title: The flags attach and detach quite easily. The belts are adjustable and large enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: My son received these for Christmas and loves them! The flags attach and detach quite easily. The belts are adjustable and large enough for adults. When on a child you do have to tie up the slack. This is a great product the entire family can enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Dogma Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great bandg for your buck
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I was looking for. Pretty high quality and will fit adults. These held their "stick" and have not yet become easy to pull off as I had feared originally. I ordered these to play some pickup football with some old friends of mine we had a great time. These came with a nice carrying case for the flags.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni R.

customer_reviews.title: great set - durable. The kinder, gentler football game for kids
customer_reviews.text: Painted our yard with white paint and turned it into a football field and bought this kit for my son's birthday party. Parents and kids played and it was a success. The flags and belts stayed together after hours of pretty rough play. This set gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: 10 sets of flags, 4 small "cones". The flags and their velcro are sturdy. The cones are very small, but more effective than they look. The belts are reasonably sized. There are some fatties that won't fit into them, but for the most part, most will be able to wear them. Nice set. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Je'kob

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for kids training
customer_reviews.text: They work great and are very well built. I'm training soccer to small kids and these flags are great for some fun games for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: FranciscoV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kids set
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old son LOVES this set. He'd used one at a friend's house and we got him one for his birthday. The flags are easy to attach and put on but snap off easily when playing.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleMom

customer_reviews.title: Durable and not flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality the same ones the parks used for my kids recreational team. As soon as my kid misplaces them I wouldn't second guess rebuying these. The small cones were an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Students LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My students love these kits, and if I had the cash, I would buy them for the whole school. A little bit of a trial period to teach kiddos how to put them on (not the clip kind, double rings), but once they figured it out, we were off and running. Very fun and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, used for ages 4-17 for a football camp, and worked beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the cones are worthless unless you're playing on a putting green. You simply can't see them. The flags and belts have held up fine after a year's worth of use (we played bi-weekly). The only issue we've had is the metal buckle rusting, but who cares if you're playing football, right?
customer_reviews.author: Tj Long Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Fits all ages/ sizes of the kids we buy it for. With it being at a reasonable price we are able to let the kids keep them after the season is done. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, used for adult flag football fundraising tournament, prompt shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Pleased Parent

customer_reviews.title: Big hit at parties
customer_reviews.text: Big hit for my boys who always need to have something to do. My husband even likes it for friends at a party we take it to parties all the time. It is made well and holds up for all the tugging and I also like to case it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Happy nephew - 8yrs old
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my nephew for his birthday. This brand, the flags are Velcro-ed on and can be pulled off - the way it should be. I also sent him the 9-inch flexi cones (pack of 4) because I heard that the cones this shipped with are worthless. Belts/flags are worth it, though. He has enjoyed playing. Little sis likes to pull the flags off him.
customer_reviews.author: Tora

customer_reviews.title: We have a ton of fun with these
customer_reviews.text: We have a ton of fun with these. Seem to be good quality as we have used them a number of times.
customer_reviews.author: Shalise Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Well Made.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Used for our annual Kids vs Parents Flag game. Only issue was that the flags are very tightly folded, thus need a lot of time to flatten out. But other than that...they held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Magnum PI

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Kids have so much fun playing this and so do I. It's a great game that everyone enjoys.
customer_reviews.author: S. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Good set.
customer_reviews.text: Great little set for the little on for Christmas. We can't wait to use it more this spring! It has quality flags that seem to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Randian300

customer_reviews.title: The kids absolutely love to play with this game and ask for it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an after school program to play with rather than the ever dangerous "tag". The kids absolutely love to play with this game and ask for it daily. The flags are durable enough and are easily strapped on. Super fun for ages 5-12!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR 13 y/o BOYS
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for our 13 y/o's birthday party. It held up under a full night of fun. The set is decent quality and the price point was spot on for what we needed it for. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Boys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very nicely! Plan to use for my 14yo son's football frenzy theme birthday.
customer_reviews.author: gracefullyRN

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Just like I remember using as a kid! Good quality set - The belts are plenty big enough for adults, and the quality is good enough to last a couple of games without any sign of wear & tear. The zipper case is convenient for storage too.
customer_reviews.author: mkim309

customer_reviews.title: Great product! My boys love these bc they have ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My boys love these bc they have the easy Velcro attachment and are easier to put back on and pull off. They said this was the kind they had been looking for!
customer_reviews.author: SarahUnderhill

customer_reviews.title: great for a friendly game of flag football
customer_reviews.text: great for a friendly game of flag football. my only complaint is that the flags are able to slide around on the belt, but i do understand it is necessary because one size needs to fit all.
customer_reviews.author: Yvan

customer_reviews.title: Fun outdoor play
customer_reviews.text: My husband takes the boys out to the backyard and they have a ball. He is using this set to teach my 6 year old how to play, so he can join the 7 year old flag football team in next year.
customer_reviews.author: donna fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great. They have been used alot and still holding strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for any child who likes to play football.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki S.

customer_reviews.title: Beach flag football is so much fun. The flags worked well
customer_reviews.text: Beach flag football is so much fun. The flags worked well. The tiny cones were hard to see in the sand. They might be easier to see on grass?
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Coy

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my boys birthday party and for the price they were excellent. They worked great and we played for hours. After we were done they folded back up and fit back in the case with cones. I would definetly buy these again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Pops

customer_reviews.title: Fun and durable!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and the neighbor kids love playing with these and they are so durable!
customer_reviews.author: DesireeGriggs

customer_reviews.title: Terrific set. Purchased for my son to use with ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrific set. Purchased for my son to use with his friends. Has gotten a lot of use and really held up.
customer_reviews.author: Kim G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our church youth group. The set arrived on time and we would purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Big hit as a Birthday gift for 11 year old boy!
customer_reviews.author: KARRI THURMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to order these because the ones in the stores near us did not have the velcro flags. This product is worth it alone for the flags! The closure is easy to strap on and when the kids pull the flags, only the flags come off....not the entire belt which we had had in the past!! The cones are teeny tiney and worthless.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: For $20 these flags are very well made! Long lasting and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon's Favorite Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun quality purchase
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a family reunion and they worked great for all ages and sizes. Good quality!

product_meta.title: SKLZ Flag Football 10-Player Deluxe Set with Flags, Belts, and Cones
product_meta.description: It’s time to bring your A-game as you make your way to the field with the SKLZ 10-Man Flag Football Deluxe set. This all-inclusive gear set includes 10 flag football belts (5 yellow, 5 blue), 2 Velcro flags per belt, 4 goal line cones, flag football rules, and an easy carry bag for easy storage and transportation. For high school varsity teams during practice, or for kids at the park, it has everything you need for a fun scrimmage. Designed with 2 Velcro attached flags per belt, and a secure D-ring closure, they won’t fall off during the game. The nylon webbed flags are durable, so you don’t have to worry about them ripping or tearing as you outrun the defense and score that ultimate game winning touchdown. Improve technique, stay in shape during off season, or simply have some fun with the SKLZ 10-Man Flag Football Deluxe set.
feature_bullets: COMPLETE FLAG FOOTBALL SET. This gear set includes 10 flag football belts (5 yellow, 5 blue) with 2 Velcro attached flags, 4 goal line cones, flag football rules, and bag. Grab a football and friends as you take this set to the field

HOURS OF FUN. Get the team together for a pick-up game at the park, or a backyard scuffle. Whether you’re trying to stay in shape during the off-season, or simply using this for entertainment, this set is will fit your flag football needs

DURABLE QUALITY EQUIPMENT. Each ultra-durable belt is designed with 2 detachable nylon flags and utilize a D-ring closure, meaning this set will give you hours of use. SKLZ 10-Man Flag Football Deluxe set is made for the rough games and strong grips

ONE SIZE FITS MOST. Recommended for ages 7+, these belts are one size fits most, for kids and adults alike. Let the whole family join in, there’s no reason to stand on the sideline when you can get your head in the game

100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. SKLZ is committed to elevating the athlete in each and reminding you why you love the game. Sometimes that looks like an intense practice with your team, other times it means having fun with your friends
